subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: The golfer, who broke off his engagement to the tennis star Caroline Wozniacki last week, hurt his knee in the opening round of the Memorial Tournament, but still took a three-stroke lead with a nine-under-par 63.
snippet: The golfer, who broke off his engagement to the tennis star Caroline Wozniacki last week, hurt his knee in the opening round of the Memorial Tournament, but still took a three-stroke lead with a nine-under-par 63.
